question.text:
Fill in the reagents for the given conversion

CH3COCl→XCH3CHO→YCH3-C|HOH-CH2CHO→ZCH3CH=CHCHO

options.text:
X Y Z
Pd/BaSO4 dil. NaOH heat

X Y Z
NaOH Hydrolysis heat

X Y Z
I2/NaOH LiAlH4 H3O+

X Y Z
CrO3 Warm CO2
